reviews.review:
this game is the most amazing experience i have ever had in a pc game of this type
it is worth the 20 bucks
I love hearing glados being sarcastic at me

I liked the new take on the FPS genre mixed with puzzles that leverage the Steam engine. I bought the Portal pack when it was on sale, and I recommend it for anyone who has not played it. 

The game has a great twist in the story line, and you can tell that Valve paid a lot of attention to crafting the introduction of mechanics to the player. Once you've finished the game, the challenges and advanced chambers lead to more replay opportunities. I'd love it if there was a Community Test Chamber added like the one found in Portal 2.
Its kinda short
Do you like making portals and getting killed by turets.Then portal and portal 2 are for you.
I love this game I have been wanting it for a really long time
one of the best puzzle games :)!

Good game.

I'm not a fast-reaction type of person, so while I did know how to get to a place, actually getting there was like NOT AGAIN DONT FALL DO THE THING! PRESS THE BUTTON FAST! OH NO! AAARRGG!  but yeah. fun game. I spent more time failing to place a portal in time than actually getting places in some levels, especially the later ones.

It was nice. It was..different. Never really played a game like this before. And I've always like the idea of being able to gateway yourself somewere like this.



probably...8.5. or an 8. out of 10.


Definitely recommend. At least try it out.

Succession de puzzle faisnt avancer le scénario.
Tutoriel clair, scénario intéresant, bon graphisme.

Le rhytme est calme, la difficulté bien graduée et les erreurs se ratrape sans difficulté. La campagne se termine en une heure sans se heuter à de grande difficulté.

Le décord est peut-être un peut austère avec une impression de solitude, mais le second volet me sert surement de référence sur ce point.

Le jeu propose des pistes enrichissant le scénario normal, mais sans possibilité de l'altérer.

Pour comclure, je le conseille, certes moins fortement que son successeur, qui intègre toutes les mécaniques misent en place dans ce jeu. Cepandant, outre l'aspect historique de la série, ce premier opus mérite qu'on y prète attention.
muy buen juego,intelctual y entretenido a la vez que original

Portal is one of my favourite video game, because whether all puzzle video games only consists of moving objects to foals, this one has an incredible instant teleporation!

Due to its portalbtechnology, this game is not so hard to be completed because I've beaten this game for only 2 hours.

The design was frustrated me a lot so I could relas enjoying it, and I also listening to its commentary of the developer of this game, it was so hard to described because they have been carefully developed this game until it has sold in my PC...

And one thing, the storytelling was so good to be followed due the sound of the Glados and the sentry turrets is really funny. But I wasn't satisfied about the ambience of the enviroment, because there was section of the game which I could heard it was the ambience of the Ravenholm in Half-Life 2. But that wasn't a major problem of this game.

Классно.Головоломки которые тебе реально ломают мозг.Графика приятная на глаз.Все хорошо КРОМЕ-фоновая музыка(ее просто нет)долгие загрузки,и утомительный гемплей (вы поиграете денёк и все,вы больше не предёте в эту игру)
Но если вы любитель головоломок,то вам по душе эта игра.Как все другие игры(головоломки) игра на раз.

7/10

So, you have decided to build yourself a gaming PC. You fire it up and log onto Steam for the first time and you are greeted with thousands of choices. You ask yourself "Where the heck should I start?" I believe for those who are just getting into PC gaming, Portal is the perfect place to start. One, it's inexpensive. Two, and most importantly, it embodies perfectly what PC gaming is all about, an experience that is unique. Three, it's short, so you get a taste of PC gaming without sinking thousands hours of your life. But onto the traditional review:
Visuals and Sound: Graphically, it has aged, It indeed looks like a game that came from 2007. But, Portal has a distinct style that is so aestiheticly  pleasing that I would by no means call it ugly. The sound is mostly subtle. However, the ones that are there are top-notch. The portal gun sounds satisfying and the voice acting is incredible. The music is not that noticeable, but the soundtrack does set the tone nicely,
Gameplay: Just perfect. Unique, memorable, and most importantly FUN. 
Performance: Solid, but not perfect. Throughout my playthrough, I did experience a few frame rate drops, but nothing major to detract from the overall experience. 
Overall, Portal is fantastic. Well worth the price of admission. Like I said before, if you are new to PC gaming, THIS is the place to start

An amazong game, with complex puzzles and the amazing effects of the portal gun, this game is definitely a need to play. The only problems I have with this game are that the story mode is much too short, I would have liked it to be much longer, but the challenge maps seem to make up for that, and the concept of the portal gun can be a little difficult to grasp for some people, even though I seemed to get it really well. Definitely recomended.

An honest review of Portal.
This game is fun! sure! 
but there is a problem, you only play through 19 levels... as they increase in difficulty each level you progress, it still lacks real challenge, and gets pretty simple and easy as you get used to it. it really doesnt take that much time to beat the game. at all... unless you are not good with puzzles.
the graphics are great, and the voices and story are fun and entertaining to listen to. 
I would much rather pay $20 for more levels, instead of $9 for just 19 levels of ez

Portal est un excellent casse-tête.

久闻大名，花一晚上（4个小时）通关后沾沾自喜，来评论区一看都是两三个小时就通关了的。。。一口气通完头晕得厉害。之前以为就是个益智类游戏，没想到剧情也有一定的深度。剧情模式谜题较简单，个人表示最苦手的地方在靠后面跳进通风管道的地方。。宝宝表示手残跳不进去，搬了椅子来，感觉跳了有半小时。总的来说经典就是经典，过了那么些年还是有它吸引人的地方。
  我想在多年以后，再想起这个游戏的时候，脑海里浮现的一定是，忍着头晕目眩四小时的呕吐感，观看通关动画时，响起的可爱bgm吧~
  另有多处black mesa的小彩蛋，供君会心一笑。

作为一款策略类游戏，除了让人眼花缭乱的谜题，游戏本身的游戏设定也非常有趣---传送门。这使得玩家拥有了一定程度上的创造能力。在思索各机关之间的联系的同时，构思出新的传送门来改变它们之间的空间构造。
游戏难度适中，高级房间难度偏高，满足了充满挑战欲望玩家的心理。
但是，个人不是特别喜欢挑战模式，因为游戏的亮点不是考验玩家的操作，而是玩家的大脑。不然就是一款有创意的跑酷游戏而已了。
游戏的片尾音乐十分喜欢。
顺便一提，本人游戏时用了各种非主流玩法，包括把摄像机拆下来当做垫脚石。。。我相信肯定不是正统通关法，但是多样而不简约的解决方法难道不是游戏魅力之一吗？（笑）

Portal gives off an air of freshness, despite its age. It ingrains its unique mechanics in you so well, you probably won't even realise it was doing that until you've beaten the game several times over and unlocked every last achievement.
I have no complaints.

Lauded as a video game masterpiece and apparently it's going down the books of history as one of the greatest of all time.
I just don't see it. It's a nice physics puzzle game and that's about it. Extremely over hyped, graphics are the same as in HL2, that is extremely grainy and low quality and the story is non-existent.

I just don't see what's so great in this game, it just is there and everyone goes ape shit over it. I mean, it is a decent game, but it didn't cure cancer, ebola or aids, hunger or bring world peace like some people claim it to do.
